attributes.action: legislate to eliminate bank bonuses until public money is repaid in full!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We call on the Prime Minister and Chancellor of the Exchequer to pass legislation which will cause the staff of banks, who have managed to retain their jobs solely through the injection of massive amounts of public money, to be subject to the same salary conditions and wage controls as those workers in other branches of the Public Services. No bonuses to be paid to any bank staff until such time as the finance provided from the public purse be repaid in full to the Exchequer.
